product_name: USAOPOLY Holiday Edition Memory Challenge Game - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Deck the halls with the USAopoly Holiday Edition Memory Challenge game! Gather friends and family to enjoy a seasonal, fun new twist on this popular matching game. Includes more than 100 colorful picture cards that showcase aspects of the holiday season. Naughty or Nice cards inject a humorous new element and strategy. Designed for 1 or more players, ages 6 and up. Closeout.
short_description: Deck the halls with the USAopoly Holiday Edition Memory Challenge game! Gather friends and family to enjoy a seasonal, fun new twist on this popular matching game.
